title: History Internship
description: Supervised work experience using skills of the discipline of history in a public agency ranging from 12 to 36 hours per week. Interns work directly under the supervision of an employee of the agency and are subject to the professional responsibilities typical of the state. Total credit limited to 12 units. Credit/No Credit grading only.
prerequisites: Junior standing, completion of HIST 303 with grade of B or better and consent of internship coordinator
